Package gov.nih.nlm.ling.transform

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DependencyTransformation
    Interface to implement to define a new dependency transformation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdverbialTransformation
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that transforms a Sentence object by making explicit the semantic dependencies involving adverbial clauses.
    CoordinationTransformation
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that transforms a Sentence object by decomposing coordination instances.
    DependencyDirectionReversal
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that transforms a Sentence object by reversing the direction of dependencies, if necessary, to capture semantic dependencies for the purpose of bottom-up traversal and semantic composition.
    DiscourseConnectiveTransformation
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that transforms dependencies involving discourse connectives, such as while, on the other hand, etc.
    GenericSemanticsBinding
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that associates semantically free textual units with generic semantic objects.
    HyphenatedAdjectiveTransformation
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that splits complex, hyphenated adjectives that appear often in biomedical text.
    ModifierCoordinationCorrection
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that attempts to fix problems with modifier coordination-related dependencies, which are often misidentified by the Stanford Parser.
    NPInternalTransformation
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that collapses noun phrase-internal dependencies if possible.
    PhrasalVerbTransformation
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that transforms a Sentence object by collapsing the phrasal verbs (verb + particles).
    PolarityComposition
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that composes the meanings contributed by two textual units with respect to polarity.
    PPAttachmentCorrection
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that attempts to corect PP-attachment errors often made by Stanford Parser.
    ScopeTransformation
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that addresses wide/narrow scope associated with embedding predicates.
    TermCoordinationCorrection
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that extends coordination detection, by recognizing that terms separated by comma are likely to be coordinated.
    VerbComplexTransformation
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that transforms the dependencies that a verb is involved in as the dependent.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NPInternalTransformation.Method
